title: Retail inflation rises to 3-month high in June on rising prices of kitchen essentials, factory output expands
description: Retail inflation rises to 3-month high in June on rising prices of kitchen essentials, factory output expands The Index of Industrial Production (IIP), which reflects the country's factory output, rose to 5.2 per cent in May from 4.5 per cent in April 2023, mainly due to good performance by the manu...
